remarks: The first projection functor is a functor onto the left argument. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
1stfcl.t $e |- T = ( C Xc. D ) $.
1stfcl.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
1stfcl.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
1stfcl.p $e |- P = ( C 1stF D ) $.
1stfcl $p |- ( ph -> P e. ( T Func C ) ) $.
